author: Anonymous Atom
title: Missing Grades in Canvas
question:
Good morning everyone,
I was wondering if people were able to see any grades on their Canvas page yet?
So far, I don't have any grades posted on there and I have submitted all assigned problem sets and attended all my labs. I just wanted to know if grades haven't been posted yet or if I was having a specific issue with my Canvas.
Thank you in advance.
student_answer: Same in my case I am also not able to see my grades.
instructor_answer: Grades have not been posted to Canvas yet. Lab 1, Lab 2, and Problem Set 1 grades will be posted this afternoon.
